title: Retry build and redeploy after intermittent deployment failure

requirements.summary: Trigger a rebuild/redeploy retry for the current revision without changing application source code, and record deployment logs for troubleshooting if it fails again.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build/deploy attempt is triggered for the current project revision (no source changes).
If the deployment fails again, the build output/error logs are captured and surfaced so the next request can target a specific fix.

file_operations.description: Add a non-code runbook describing how to retrigger the build/deploy for the current revision without source changes, and where to capture/paste build output and error logs if the deployment fails again.
